pictures.picture: Mr. William Shakespeares Comedies, Histories, and Tragedies. Published according to the true Originall Copies. The Second Impression. London: Tho. Cotes for Robert Allot, 1632. Special Collections, Golda Meir Library.
John Tayler (formodentligt): William Shakespeare, ca. 1600-10. National Portrait Gallery, London. Maleriet er kendt som The Chandos Portrait.
